nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify End of Service tab is visible for active employees
checks.selector_hint: EOS tab or section in employee profile payroll area
checks.assertion: EOS tab should be visible and accessible for active employees

checks.description: Verify End of Service tab is hidden for offboarded/removed employees
checks.selector_hint: EOS tab in employee profile after offboarding
checks.assertion: EOS tab should not be visible for offboarded employees

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity file displays clear month identification
checks.selector_hint: Month label or date field in gratuity file download interface
checks.assertion: Gratuity file should clearly display which month's data is included

checks.description: Verify gratuity data matches between employee profile and downloaded file
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity values in profile vs downloaded file
checks.assertion: Gratuity amounts should be consistent between profile display and exported file

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify hiring date field is editable in employee profile
checks.selector_hint: Hiring date input field in employee profile
checks.assertion: Hiring date field should be accessible for editing

checks.description: Verify error message displays when updating hiring date with payroll history
checks.selector_hint: Error message or validation feedback near hiring date field
checks.assertion: System should display clear error message explaining payroll transaction restriction

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify date range selection option exists for gratuity reports
checks.selector_hint: Date range picker or period selection dropdown in gratuity report interface
checks.assertion: Date range selection control should be available for historical gratuity reports

checks.description: Verify monthly granularity option is available for gratuity reports
checks.selector_hint: Report frequency or granularity dropdown (daily/weekly/monthly/yearly)
checks.assertion: Monthly report option should be selectable for gratuity reporting

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify Gratuity field is available in custom payroll report template
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity field option in custom report field selector
checks.assertion: Gratuity field should be available in custom report template dropdown

checks.description: Verify gratuity values display in custom report after EOS processing
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity column values in downloaded custom report
checks.assertion: Gratuity values should populate for employees with processed EOS

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify month/cycle selector exists for accrual reports
checks.selector_hint: Month or payroll cycle dropdown in accrual report interface
checks.assertion: Month selector should allow selection of multiple closed payroll cycles

checks.description: Verify historical accrual reports are accessible for previous closed months
checks.selector_hint: Accrual report list or dropdown showing multiple months
checks.assertion: Historical accrual reports should be available for all closed payroll cycles

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify daily wage calculation option exists for leave encashment
checks.selector_hint: Daily wage calculation dropdown (Basic/Working days, Basic+Allowances/Working days)
checks.assertion: Daily wage calculation method should be configurable in EOS settings

checks.description: Verify End of Service Eligibility section displays current configuration
checks.selector_hint: EOS Eligibility section in employee profile or EOS form
checks.assertion: Eligibility section should display the selected daily wage calculation method

checks.description: Verify configuration change is reflected in eligibility display
checks.selector_hint: Daily wage calculation display in EOS Eligibility section
checks.assertion: Eligibility section should update to reflect selected daily wage calculation option

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify pro-rated EOS amount displays with correct decimal precision
checks.selector_hint: Pro-rated amount field in EOS calculation form
checks.assertion: Pro-rated amount should display with accurate decimal values

checks.description: Verify daily wage calculation (basic + allowances / 30) is visible
checks.selector_hint: Daily wage calculation breakdown in EOS form
checks.assertion: Daily wage calculation should be displayed in EOS calculation breakdown

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity accrual report column headers are clearly labeled
checks.selector_hint: Column headers in gratuity accrual report (Accrual up to previous cycle, Total accrual)
checks.assertion: Column headers should clearly distinguish between previous cycle and current cycle accruals

checks.description: Verify column definitions or tooltips explain accrual timing
checks.selector_hint: Tooltip or help text on accrual column headers
checks.assertion: Column definitions should explain the accrual period for each column

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify tenure is displayed in clear format (years, months, days)
checks.selector_hint: Tenure display field in EOS calculation (e.g., '1 year, 3 months & 16 days')
checks.assertion: Tenure should be displayed in human-readable format with years, months, and days

checks.description: Verify unpaid leave deduction is shown separately in tenure breakdown
checks.selector_hint: Unpaid leave deduction line item in EOS calculation breakdown
checks.assertion: Unpaid leave days should be displayed separately from gross tenure calculation

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify all settlement components are displayed (gratuity, pro-rated, leave, expenses)
checks.selector_hint: Settlement breakdown section in EOS form
checks.assertion: All settlement components should be visible in the breakdown

checks.description: Verify previously processed payments are shown as deductions
checks.selector_hint: Previous payments or adjustments line item in settlement breakdown
checks.assertion: Previously processed payments should be displayed as deductions from total

checks.description: Verify final settlement amount matches sum of components minus deductions
checks.selector_hint: Final settlement amount field in EOS form
checks.assertion: Final settlement total should equal sum of components minus deductions

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify opening balance of month matches closing balance of previous month
checks.selector_hint: Opening and closing balance columns in gratuity accrual report
checks.assertion: Opening balance should equal previous month's closing balance

checks.description: Verify new hire employees do not appear in accrual reports before hire date
checks.selector_hint: Employee list in gratuity accrual report
checks.assertion: New hire employees should not appear in accrual reports for periods before their hire date

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity calculation shows detailed breakdown of formula
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity calculation breakdown in EOS form
checks.assertion: Gratuity calculation should display step-by-step formula breakdown

checks.description: Verify calculation methodology is documented or explained in UI
checks.selector_hint: Help text or tooltip explaining gratuity calculation method
checks.assertion: Calculation methodology should be explained in accessible help text

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity report allows field customization
checks.selector_hint: Field selection or column customization option in gratuity report
checks.assertion: Report should allow selection of fields to include (days of service, reason, contract type)

checks.description: Verify days of service field is available in gratuity report
checks.selector_hint: Days of service field option in report customization
checks.assertion: Days of service should be available as a selectable report field

checks.description: Verify nationality-based filtering option exists for gratuity report
checks.selector_hint: Nationality filter or GCC national exclusion option in report settings
checks.assertion: Report should provide option to exclude or filter by nationality

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify leave proration calculation method option exists
checks.selector_hint: Leave calculation method dropdown (month-based vs day-based proration)
checks.assertion: Leave calculation method should be configurable

checks.description: Verify leave days calculation is displayed in EOS form
checks.selector_hint: Leave days calculation field in EOS form
checks.assertion: Leave days calculation should be visible in EOS breakdown

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify processed EOS amount displays consistently across views
checks.selector_hint: Processed amount field in EOS tab
checks.assertion: Processed amount should match across EOS tab, transaction page, and payroll table

checks.description: Verify transaction page displays correct processed amount
checks.selector_hint: Amount field in transaction history page
checks.assertion: Transaction page should display same amount as EOS tab

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity description reflects employee's country/currency
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity description text in EOS form
checks.assertion: Gratuity description should be country-specific, not hardcoded to KSA

checks.description: Verify employee currency is maintained during offboarding adjustments
checks.selector_hint: Currency field in EOS adjustment form
checks.assertion: Currency should remain as employee's original currency during EOS adjustments

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify total service duration is calculated correctly
checks.selector_hint: Total service duration field in EOS form
checks.assertion: Service duration should be calculated from hire date to departure date

checks.description: Verify option exists to exclude unpaid leave from service duration
checks.selector_hint: Unpaid leave exclusion toggle or checkbox in leave policy settings
checks.assertion: Leave policy should provide option to exclude unpaid leave from EOS calculations

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify Finance > Payroll table navigation path is accessible
checks.selector_hint: Finance menu and Payroll table link
checks.assertion: Navigation to Finance > Payroll table should be available

checks.description: Verify employee selection is available in payroll table
checks.selector_hint: Employee list or selection interface in payroll table
checks.assertion: Employees should be selectable from payroll table

checks.description: Verify End of Service option is available in employee profile
checks.selector_hint: End of Service menu item or button in employee profile
checks.assertion: End of Service option should be accessible from employee profile

checks.description: Verify departure date field is present in EOS form
checks.selector_hint: Departure date input field in EOS form
checks.assertion: Departure date field should be visible and editable

checks.description: Verify contract type selection is available in EOS form
checks.selector_hint: Contract type dropdown (limited/unlimited) in EOS form
checks.assertion: Contract type should be selectable in EOS calculation

checks.description: Verify departure reason selection is available in EOS form
checks.selector_hint: Departure reason dropdown in EOS form
checks.assertion: Departure reason should be selectable in EOS form

checks.description: Verify additions section is visible in EOS form
checks.selector_hint: Additions section or button in EOS form
checks.assertion: Additions section should be available for review and modification

checks.description: Verify deductions section is available in EOS form
checks.selector_hint: Deductions section or add deduction button in EOS form
checks.assertion: Deductions section should allow adding and editing deductions

nav.canonical: Employee Profile > End of Service > Contract Type > Reason for Departure

checks.description: Verify employee profile is accessible
checks.selector_hint: Employee profile link or navigation
checks.assertion: Employee profile should be navigable from payroll interface

checks.description: Verify End of Service section is accessible in employee profile
checks.selector_hint: End of Service tab or section in employee profile
checks.assertion: End of Service section should be accessible from employee profile

checks.description: Verify contract type can be selected in EOS calculation
checks.selector_hint: Contract type dropdown in EOS form
checks.assertion: Contract type should be selectable and affect gratuity calculation

checks.description: Verify departure reason can be selected in EOS calculation
checks.selector_hint: Departure reason dropdown in EOS form
checks.assertion: Departure reason should be selectable and affect gratuity calculation

checks.description: Verify gratuity amount is calculated and displayed
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity amount field in EOS form
checks.assertion: Gratuity amount should be calculated based on MOHRE law and displayed
